I don‚Äôt blame the developers, I was using an old device at the time, but that doesn‚Äôt make me any less annoyed.

title.label: Not bad of a card game but beware...

content.label: If you like card games then this game is 4 you but..... there‚Äôs a catch. Pay to win players are in this game as well for no skills that will torture you and the ones that think they can win because they bought every legendary card in game but end up losing. Rank matchmaking is off and will try to win even at 1 health and with only 1 card left üòÇ kinda feel bad for them. But anyways this is better than clash royal in someways

The game is fun, but the fun is taken out of it by the tricks the zombies can play. Sure the plants can play tricks as well, but the way how the zombie tricks get their own separate turn makes it unfair. I know it‚Äôs to even things out, but it isn‚Äôt even when you have tricks that can literally destroy each of the plant hero‚Äôs teammates! I once had to wait five turns to attack due to my enemy having many trick cards! Please make the tricks more fair because I have been losing left and right due to these tricks. Also usually, I will run out of cards and only rely on the cards that are given to me every turn. It would be nice if you added something that gives you three extra cards if you run out of cards.

This game is great but it has been abandoned by the devs

You know how I know, there has been some puzzles in puzzle party that has not been fixed yet and even when the puzzle comes back after a rotation, you can tell that the devs won‚Äôt fix anything anymore, they left this game to die. There are many other examples too, set 5 when? Never, no new cards has been introduced in forever. I‚Äôm honestly questioning why sometimes they have updates since after every update, nothing changes.
